LobbyMainGuard_29.text: I don't have a vault pass.

LobbyMainGuard_8.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_8.context: NodeContext: Bored, directing us towards the clerk to obtain a pass.

LobbyMainGuard_52.speaker: Player
LobbyMainGuard_52.text: I hear another group descended just before me.

LobbyMainGuard_10.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_10.text: Aye - Glitterbeard brought some giant down just now. He had eyes as dark as winter's crack, and twice as cold.

LobbyMainGuard_37.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_37.text: He also had a vault pass.

LobbyMainGuard_56.speaker: Player
LobbyMainGuard_56.text: I don't have a pass. But I do have some gold...

LobbyMainGuard_13.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_13.text: This is the wealthiest banking house on the Coast. Gods' ransom sitting under our feet.

LobbyMainGuard_50.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_50.text: So if it's a bribe you're angling at, well... this I have to hear.

LobbyMainGuard_53.speaker: Player
LobbyMainGuard_53.text: When I am Lord and Tyrant over all the Material Planes, you shall be rewarded beyond your wildest dreams.

LobbyMainGuard_7.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_7.text: You wouldn't believe how often we get that one in here.

LobbyMainGuard_30.speaker: Player
LobbyMainGuard_30.text: My pass was stolen. Truly. This is all the coin I have left. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

LobbyMainGuard_47.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_47.text: A better sum than I expected. You're lucky Glitterbeard's busy with other guests below.

LobbyMainGuard_15.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_15.text: That's a sad story, truly. Tell it to Meadhoney at the counter - and get a vault pass while you're at it.
LobbyMainGuard_15.context: NodeContext: Blunt acknowledgement of the sad story we've just woven - immediately jumps into directing us to towards the counter, utterly unmoved

LobbyMainGuard_32.speaker: Player
LobbyMainGuard_32.text: You've had stranger visitors than me today. I won't be noticed, and you can make a tidy profit. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_3_01f129ea-b4dc-44b6-8154-9a948f876a82])

LobbyMainGuard_18.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_18.text: Glitterbeard's a little preoccupied with his other clients, true enough. Go on, then.

LobbyMainGuard_0.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_0.text: Right: 'Descend, and know: upon entering the vaults, you forego the protection of city and church law alike.'
LobbyMainGuard_0.context: NodeContext: Clearing throat, drawing herself up and reciting - no matter how you got there, this is the official bit she does in all cases.

LobbyMainGuard_42.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_42.text: Which is to say - keep to your own vault, and you'll be fine.

LobbyMainGuard_43.speaker: Player
LobbyMainGuard_43.text: All that gold you guard, and you never get a taste of it yourself? Seems unfair. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

LobbyMainGuard_46.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_46.text: Not the first time that's occurred to me, you know. And Glitterbeard's distracted with his other guests...

LobbyMainGuard_1.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_1.text: Life's unfair. And you still need a vault pass.

LobbyMainGuard_36.speaker: Player
LobbyMainGuard_36.text: You can make some gold, or die guarding someone else's. Choose. ([GEN_CheckMagicPocketGold_2_463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca])

LobbyMainGuard_12.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_12.text: You wouldn't make it past the second door. But... that'd be cold comfort to my corpse, true enough.

LobbyMainGuard_20.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_20.text: Go, then, you mad bastard. But if Glitterbeard catches you down there, do me the service of dying before you name any names.

LobbyMainGuard_14.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_14.text: You've got steel in you, no mistake. But it's gold that counts around here.

LobbyMainGuard_34.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_34.text: So talk to Meadhoney, and come back with a vault pass.

LobbyMainGuard_23.speaker: Player
LobbyMainGuard_23.text: You misunderstand me. I'll be going.

LobbyMainGuard_38.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
LobbyMainGuard_38.text: Feel free to come back. With a vault pass.

AD_PrivateGuard_03_Idle_0.speaker: Cashguard Artillerist Loretta
AD_PrivateGuard_03_Idle_0.text: Well, my prayers weren't much bloody use.

AD_PrivateGuard_03_Idle_1.speaker: Cashguard Artillerist Loretta
AD_PrivateGuard_03_Idle_1.text: So Minsc has turned to the Absolute. Maybe there's something to this cult...

AD_PrivateGuard_03_Idle_2.speaker: Cashguard Artillerist Loretta
AD_PrivateGuard_03_Idle_2.text: Hells, if I'd have known there was that much coin back here, I'd have robbed the place myself.

VaultGuard_8.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_8.text: Full privacy when you're down there, right? No guards poking about, and walls thick enough to drown a banshee's wail.

VaultGuard_11.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_11.text: Hope you had a fruitful visit, saer. But - that's your business, of course.
VaultGuard_11.context: NodeContext: Polite, friendly - second line is nervously rushing to assure us he wasn't prying. The upper crust don't appreciate spreading their bank business around.

VaultGuard_12.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_12.text: Just need to see your vault pass, please.

VaultGuard_38.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_38.text: Wait - didn't the Head Banker already take you down?

VaultGuard_10.speaker: Minsc
VaultGuard_10.text: Ah, you speak of the Stone Lord? No, no - he only looked, sounded, and quite possibly smelled exactly like Minsc.
VaultGuard_10.context: NodeContext: 'Ah, I see - you've made an understandable mistake'

VaultGuard_40.speaker: Minsc
VaultGuard_40.text: A needful sniff, perhaps? So you know I am no impostor?
VaultGuard_40.context: NodeContext: Raising an armpit speculatively, all very helpful

VaultGuard_24.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_24.text: That... won't be necessary. Go ahead.
VaultGuard_24.context: NodeContext: absolutely confused, wants you out of the way

VaultGuard_29.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_29.text: Looks in order. Blessed day to you.

VaultGuard_44.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_44.text: You shouldn't even be down here without one. Talk to Meadhoney - upstairs.

VaultGuard_0.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_0.text: No idea. Our post is out here. Besides his chosen swords, Head Banker Glitterbeard doesn't like us asking what goes on below.

VaultGuard_28.speaker: Player
VaultGuard_28.text: I just showed it to you, don't you remember? Are you feeling all right?

VaultGuard_51.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_51.text: You did? Oh, sorry - things have been hectic. Go on ahead.
VaultGuard_51.context: NodeContext: bit addled, doesn't remember the player showing his pass, but doesn't want to admit it either

VaultGuard_30.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_30.text: Then you'll show it again. Vault. Pass.

VaultGuard_50.speaker: Player
VaultGuard_50.text: I'm with the group that came down just before me.

VaultGuard_21.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_21.text: You work for that mean bastard and you turn up late?

VaultGuard_20.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_20.text: I'd be running the other way - but go on, then. Your funeral.

VaultGuard_42.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_42.text: That lot looked half-rabid - had Glitterbeard all aflutter.

VaultGuard_33.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_33.text: And they still needed a vault pass.

VaultGuard_25.speaker: Player
VaultGuard_25.text: It's just us down here. No one to judge you for choosing life over 'duty'.

VaultGuard_49.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_49.text: Just... don't let Glitterbeard see you, right?

VaultGuard_34.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_34.text: Hah. No one to see your corpse slip into the bay, either. We've built a chute for just that purpose.

VaultGuard_41.speaker: Player
VaultGuard_41.text: The city depends on me getting down there. I really don't have time to explain.

VaultGuard_7.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_7.text: Is this... why Glitterbeard's been acting so strangely?

VaultGuard_53.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_53.text: Go, then. I might be out of my head, but... gods help me, I believe you.

VaultGuard_1.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_1.text: Got notions, don't you? Pity you don't have the coin to back them up.

VaultGuard_46.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_46.text: Did you actually buy your way past Faril?

VaultGuard_6.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_6.text: Well, if she got paid, you can be damn sure I will too. Go on.

VaultGuard_27.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_27.text: Best pretend I didn't hear that.

VaultGuard_18.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_18.text: You really shouldn't be down here without a vault pass.

VaultGuard_26.speaker: Cashguard Basher Nickelow
VaultGuard_26.text: Mate. Just go and get a bloody vault pass.

Guard_11_0.speaker: Cashguard Basher Vikki
Guard_11_0.text: See the armour? Not a clerk.

AD_Guard_11_Patrol_0.speaker: Cashguard Basher Vikki
AD_Guard_11_Patrol_0.text: My feet hurt, and I need a drink.

AD_Guard_11_Patrol_2.speaker: Cashguard Basher Vikki
AD_Guard_11_Patrol_2.text: Nobody talk to me. Not in the mood today.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_7.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_7.text: Mark the notice in the barracks, by the way. The anti-magic whatsit is banjaxed.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_10.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_10.text: Aye, I heard. Word is the Gondian guild has downed tools and gone walkabouts.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_5.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_5.text: Striking, I bet. Lazy gits. Wish I could go on strike.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_11.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_11.context: NodeContext: Working a sore shoulder, grunting in pain.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_2.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_2.text: Shoulder. Glitterbeard kept checking this one chest in the vault, over and over - nearly dropped a door on me. Mustn't have seen me.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_12.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_12.text: Glitterbeard was in a mood just now.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_0.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_0.text: A mood? Mate, he was nervous.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_4.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_4.text: What for? The big bald fellow he was escorting?

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_3.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_3.text: With the half-elf, aye. New clients, maybe? Either way, Glitterbeard was fit to fill his trousers.

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_9.speaker: Cashguard Basher Forstum
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_9.text: Heh. Just as well he's going down to special deposits.
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_9.context: NodeContext: Making a terrible joke about poo

AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_1.speaker: Cashguard Captain Faril
AD_LobbyCheckpointGuards_Convo_1.context: NodeContext: Mildly put off, shutting down the bad joke.
